name: Labo (EmperorParadox)
description:
Hello, there is a french prototype made in few days. You're playing a little demon trying to find way out of the "Labo" (a lab). By jumping and crouching, you have to lead this little one to the exit. It's only a short short game for now, but try to enjoy :)

Movements with Arrows : up to jump, right and left to move, down to crouch (can't move while crouching)

Music from: Heatley Bros- Royalty free music.

Translationin english: "Hello, Welcome in..., The Lab!, Let's go"

                                     "First test: Jumping" 

                                     "It's embarrassing"

                                     "
